trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to the <xref:System.Net.UploadDataCompletedEventHandler>.
Gets the server reply to a data upload operation started by calling an <xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取通过调用启动的数据上载操作的服务器回复<xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync*>方法。</xref:System.Net.WebClient.UploadDataAsync*>

trans-unit.source: You should check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> properties before using the data returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 应检查<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>之前使用此属性返回的数据的属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property's value is an <xref:System.Exception> object or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the Result property's value will not be valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>属性的值是<xref:System.Exception>对象或<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>属性的值是`true`、 未正确完成异步操作和结果属性的值将无效。</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Byte> array containing the server reply.
